Get ballot title

Source: R/fokus.gen.R
ballot_title.Rd

Returns the ballot title consisting of the ballot type and the ballot date in German prose.

ballot_title(
  ballot_date = ballot_dates,
  canton = cantons(ballot_date),
  lang = c("de", "en")
)

Arguments

ballot_date

A valid FOKUS-covered cantonal ballot date. One of

  • "2018-09-23"

  • "2018-11-25"

  • "2019-10-20"

  • "2020-09-27"

  • "2020-10-18"

  • "2021-11-28"
canton

A valid FOKUS canton name (lowercase) covered at ballot_date.
lang

Language. One of

  • "de"

  • "en"

Value

A character scalar.

Examples

fokus::ballot_title(ballot_date = "2019-10-20",
                    canton = "aargau")
#> Wahltermin vom 20. Oktober 2019
